name: Vaulderie
tagline: A mobile app to make LARP Vaulderie a cinch
body:
### Vaulderie

Rock-Paper-Scissor is fun - but not for ten minutes. That's where this app comes in.
You can get the app on [Google Play](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.cyrusinnovation.vaulderie) or on the [App Store](http://itunes.apple.com/us/app/vaulderie/id542689424?ls=1&mt=8).

Questions, comments? We welcome all feedback. Please send us an email at vaulderieapp@cyruslists.com.
